name: Matrices and Differential Equations
references: E. Kreyszig, Advanced Engineering Mathematics, Eighth Edition, John Wiley and Sons, 2015.
B. S. Grewal, Higher Engineering Mathematics, Khanna Publications, 2015.
R. K. Jain and S. R. K. Iyengar, Advanced Engineering Mathematics, Fifth Edition, Narosa Publishing House, 2016.
G. Strang, Linear Algebra and Its Applications, 4th Edition, Brooks/Cole India,
T. M. Apostol, Calculus, Volume 2 (2nd Edition), Wiley Eastern, 1980.

Matrix Theory: Linear dependence and independence of vectors
Consistency of the system of linear equations
Eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a matrix
Reduction of a quadratic form to canonical form - orthogonal transformation
Properties of complex matrices - Hermitian, skew-Hermitian and Unitary matrices.
Ordinary Differential Equations of Highe: Higher order linear differential equations with constant coefficients - homogeneous and non-homogeneous
Applications in physical problems - forced oscillations, electric circuits, etc.
Laplace Transforms: Laplace transforms of unit step function, impulse function, periodic function
Solving system of linear differential equations
Finding responses of systems to various inputs viz. sinusoidal inputs acting over a time interval, rectangular waves, impulses etc.
